column3: Side - Reception:
column5: Component
column11: Purpose: To provide a high-level, strategic view of the six primary energetic balances within the organization. This sheet calculates the "inhale/exhale" dynamic for each of the six geometrically-defined harmonic pairs. It is the "macro-scope" that reveals the fundamental state of equilibrium or disequilibrium in the system, complementing the tactical, neighbor-to-neighbor view of the EDGE_TENSION_MAP.

column3: Face 11
column5: Projection (Exhale): Funding Pursuit
Reception (Inhale): Capital Held
column11: Pair 1 (Face 1 ? 11): Financial Capital ? Funding Pipeline (The "Resource Flow" Axis)
Pair 2 (Face 2 ? 7): Intellectual Capital ? Brand & Reputation (The "Substance & Story" Axis)

column3: Face 7
column5: Projection (Exhale): Brand Projected
column11: Pair 3 (Face 3 ? 8): Human Capital ? Core Operations (The "Being & Doing" Axis)

column5: Reception (Inhale): IP Embodied
column11: Pair 4 (Face 4 ? 9): Structural Capital ? Regenerative Flow (The "Form & Integrity" Axis)
Pair 5 (Face 5 ? 10): Market Resonance ? Foundational Values (The "Perception & Truth" Axis)

column3: Face 8
column5: Projection (Exhale): Operations Done
column11: Pair 6 (Face 6 ? 12): Community & Partners ? Risk & Resilience (The "Network & Fortress" Axis)

column5: Reception (Inhale): Human Energy

column11: A score above 1.2 suggests the organization is receiving/holding more energy than it is projecting/acting. A score below 0.8 suggests it is projecting/acting with more energy than it is receiving/regenerating.

column3: Face 9
column5: Projection (Exhale): Structures Built
Reception (Inhale): Regen. Flow

column3: Projection Question (The Exhale)
column5: Reception Question (The Inhale)
column10: Reception Face: F9: Regenerative Flow (The living integrity)

column3: Are we actively seeking any resources to exist?
column5: Do we have enough cash to survive?

column3: Is our funding pursuit efficient and systematic?
column5: Is our capital being managed with discipline?
column10: Projection Face: F5: Market Resonance (The truth perceived by others)

column3: Are we building trust with values-aligned funders?
column5: Is our capital use creating stakeholder trust?
column10: Reception Face: F10: Foundational Values (The truth held within)

column3: Are we seeking capital to fund bold experiments?
column5: Is our capital base diverse enough for creative risks?

column3: Is our financial story attracting aligned capital?
column5: Do our financial reports express our integrity?
column10: Projection Face: F6: Community & Partners (The external network)

column3: Are we seeking capital for 100-year projects?
column5: Is our capital structured for generational stewardship?
column10: Reception Face: F12: Risk & Resilience (The internal fortress)

column3: Is our very presence a magnet for sacred capital?
column4: Capital as a Field of Grace
column5: Is our capital a pure gift to the world?

column3: Projection Question (The Exhale)
column5: Reception Question (The Inhale)

column3: Do we have a basic, functional description of our idea?
column5: Have we documented the core of the idea?

column3: Is our brand message consistent and reliable?
column5: Is our IP robust and well-architected?

column3: Does our brand story build community and trust?
column5: Is our IP being co-created with our partners?

column3: Is our brand actively telling new, challenging stories?
column5: Is our IP portfolio generating novel creations?

column3: Is our brand's voice a beautiful and authentic work of art?
column5: Is our knowledge expressed with a masterful, simple elegance?

column3: Is our brand telling a story that can change the future?
column5: Is our IP a legacy that will serve future generations?

column3: Is our brand an archetypal symbol for truth itself?
column5: Is our knowledge a living field of planetary consciousness?

column3: Projection Question (The Exhale)
column5: Reception Question (The Inhale)

column3: Is any work getting done?
column5: Does the founder have the energy to exist?

column3: Is our work efficient and reliable?
column5: Is our team stable and are roles clear?

column3: Does our work feel collaborative and joyful?
column5: Does our team feel safe and connected?

column3: Are we creating space for operational innovation?
column5: Do our people have the psychological safety to be creative?

column3: Are we transparently sharing how we work?
column5: Is our culture a story worth telling?

column3: Is our work a path to collective mastery?

column3: Is our work itself a form of meditation and service?
column5: Is our collective being a source of healing for the world?

column3: Projection Question (The Exhale)
column5: Reception Question (The Inhale)

column3: Do we have the basic legal forms to exist?
column5: Are we making conscious, integrity-based choices?

column3: Are our processes resilient and scalable?
column5: Are those processes designed to reduce waste?

column3: Do our structures feel fair and empowering?
column5: Are our relationships with our stakeholders regenerative?

column3: Does our governance allow for creative rule-breaking?
column5: Is our creativity in service of regeneration?

column3: Are we radically transparent about our structures?

column3: Is our governance model itself designed to evolve?
column5: Are we a steward for future generations?

column3: Has our structure dissolved into emergent order?
column5: Are we a living expression of the Earth healing itself?

column3: Are we building a loyal, trusting community?
column5: Are our values lived in our daily relationships?

column3: Is the market co-creating our product with us?
column5: Are our values themselves a source of innovation?

column3: Does the market feel our authentic signal?
column5: Is our public expression of values a beacon of truth?

column3: Is the market seeing us as a shaper of the future?

column3: Have "we" and "the market" dissolved into one field?
